short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly skips YouTube ads as soon as the 'Skip Ad' button appears.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension automatically skips YouTube™ ads, allowing you to enjoy uninterrupted videos. No more clicking the "Skip Ad" button – it's all done for you.

If you encounter any issues, please leave a comment on the extension page.

If you enjoy using this extension, please rate it five stars and share your valuable feedback.

You can also support me by buying me a cup of coffee: [https://paypal.me/tikamchand06](https://paypal.me/tikamchand06).
